join in (something).translation[0].defin: to take part in something that a group of people are doing or that someone else does
In the evening there was a barbecue, with the whole village joining in the fun.
He stared at them without joining in the conversation.
He laughed loudly, and Mattie joined in.
join in (something).translation[1].defin: to take part in something with another group, company, or organization
We would be eager to join in projects of that sort.
